topic.title: Why Python engineer earn less salary than Java engineer(Especially in China)?
topic.body: I was a Java engineer and changed to Python 3 years ago. Now I feel regret, because of Python is not popular in China. But why Python is more popular in US?

1567083429_18XhjA8AwgyxU1JF9VPyMEaDSmFEz.body:
> [sargantaneta](#comment_1_19RpRPxZRcw6AvSLb4RuxqP5zgLjAzWC56): The most important thing because python is popular is the machine learning. Java was a good language, but i think also was overrated. [...]

I prefer Python too, and I'm working using Python.
